basics.name: Michael Parcewski
basics.label: Human Architecture Lead, Cloud First NA

work.name: Accenture
highlights: Constructed a rolling “incubator and innovation” solution to replace an existing Enterprise Architecture team at a Fortune 50 technology organization as part of a broader effort to synchronize cross-functional workgroups and their group of companies.
Developed a diversity hiring program focused on candidates that weren’t even making it into our pipelines but brought strong critical thinking and unique industry experience to our teams.

Defined the target architecture, technologies, and delivery roadmap of a property management system for an industry-leading hospitality company to elevate their customer engagement capabilities on and off property, including IoT devices.

Served as Lead Architect for the delivery of an enterprise legacy decoupling (application modernization/re-imagining) project for a Fortune 100 healthcare enterprise which streamlined the customer experience across online and in-person touchpoints.

Developed an API governance framework, operating model and platform that allowed a fortune 100 company to dramatically increase velocity (60%), while improving overall quality in a polyglot environment that facilitated new product development.
Integrated Domain Driven Design and Behavior Driven Development into the software development lifecycle (SDLC) at multiple Fortune 50, 100, and 500 clients, enabling them to grow at scale.
Worked as an SME across multiple client programs in topics ranging from program design and delivery, modern engineering practices, site reliability engineering, and multi-cloud architectures.
work.summary: Responsible for bringing together Cloud Native Architecture Principles and Modern Engineering Processes/Practices to deliver at scale for large programs or as part of organizational transformations.

work.name: Accenture
work.summary: Responsible for training Accenture clients and teams modern engineering principles and processes (think Domain Driven Design, xP, Agile flavors, Product Engineering, etc...) as part of enterprise delivery through hands on leadership and training programs.

work.name: Accenture
work.position: Cloud Native Delivery and Capabilities Lead
work.summary: Architect and delivery lead for complex multi-speed (Cloud, Datacenter, and On-Premise) projects as part of our client transformations and greenfield development.

work.name: Accenture
work.summary: Helped develop and drive transformation (business and technology modernization) using value driven approaches with a sprinkling of common sense.

work.name: Accenture
work.summary: Architect, design and develop cloud native (and friendly) solutions for mission critical legacy applications to help them achieve both scaling and resiliency goals.

work.name: DST Systems (Formerly WMSI and S&P)
work.position: Enterprise Solutions Architect & Product Manager - Cloud, MicroServices, Integration and UX
highlights: Stood up a set of product engineering teams from scratch while defining the processes, methodologies, and tools to support and evolve the organization tasked with delivering disruptive technology products that solve integration, compliance, marketing, and education problems for our financial clients.
Ideated, architected, and launched a cloud-based services enablement platform that enabled teams to design, manage, customize, and distribute custom applications to partners and clients.

Established an “Intelligent Automation Framework” combining a set of processes and tools which enabled product teams to accelerate time to market with opportunities for continuous improvement and product iteration.
Defined the standards for UI accessibility across browser/device and product line while supporting the teams responsible for the rebuild and testing efforts.
Mobilized a global network of technical teams and business partners to architect, develop, test, deliver a first-of-its-kind investing solution to the Southeast Asia market.

Developed our Interactive Site Solutions (ISS) product made for third party distributors and resellers, enabling the creation of personalized interactive education centers into web sites and mobile applications.

Created Newsletter OnDemand (NOD), a one-of-a-kind marketing and communications tool for Financial Advisors and Institutional Marketers that produced and distributed communications to any medium from a simple intuitive interface.

Led the design and development of Investment Data Profiles Suite (IDP), a combination of solutions that included big data store derived from real time financial data, rules engine, developer integration portal and a simple HTML/JS templating system, enabling customizable compliance materials & profiles.
work.summary: Design and develop financial literacy and education software and programs utilizing best in breed technology, adult learning theory and gamification.

work.name: DST Systems (Formerly WMSI and S&P)
work.summary: Developed and managed an innovative technology product and consulting team that solved a variety of problems (integration, compliance, marketing and education) across the financial services industry.

work.name: DST Systems (Formerly WMSI and S&P)
work.summary: Led the design, development and deployment of a new suite of product lines – over fifteen syndicated and sixty plus custom solutions – for customers like Singapore Stock Exchange, UBS, Bank of America/Merrill Lynch, and TD Ameritrade

work.name: Experience, Inc
highlights: Second engineer onboarded to build out the technology organization and scalable solutions in collaboration with Executive Leadership, Product Management, QA, and Operations teams.

Lead the data integration projects for partners such as HotJobs, CareerBuilder, and Dice from determining priorities, defining timelines, and allocating resources across all phases of the project lifecycle.
Developed the integration patterns and technologies our partners used for all content and job integrations.
Introduced cutting edge open-source solutions around security, search, document conversion/management, web analytics, and ad targeting.

Designed, architected and built a pluggable search and query service that allowed partners, customers and developers to quickly integrate disparate data sources like Oracle, SQL Server, Altavista and even mainframe systems.
work.summary: Brought in during the early stages of VC funded start-up to build a design and engineering team for the development of a set of sites and suite of tools to help college students and recent graduates get their first jobs as well as career centers place candidates with their partners.

references.name: Sara Hammond
references.reference:
Mike continued to amaze me at my time at FC because of his ability to adapt and utilize new technologies based on his clients needs and wants.  I have never seen someone put together a tablet application, Flex application, or any type of web application as efficiently and quickly as Mike did.  His ability to produce out of thin air was nothing short of miraculous. 

I worked for him for over three years, and he has pushed me hard, but the push has trained me for all of my future jobs to be the best and the brightest.

references.name: Jenny Floren Sozzi
references.reference: Mike was a valuable member of our start-up team at Experience. He's not afraid to tackle the toughest challenges.  I'd be delighted to serve as a reference for MP at any time.

references.name: Ken Berquist (He, Him, His)
references.reference:
Mike has a way to complete a 30 day development project in 20 days, and the work is creative and the results flawless. He is more than someone who gets the job done, he is a very creative thinker which usually equates to a simplified and more stable developoment approach.
Mike is a great guy with a ever present quick sense of humor!
